channel.title: Fastest way to two 99's?
channel.description:
I want to get two 99's. I want to get 99 prayer and 99 ranged. Please answer these questions.
[b][font=comic sans ms][size=12pt]Prayer[/size][/font][/b]
[ul][li]How long does 99 Prayer take?[/li] [li]How much does 99 Prayer cost from 60?[/li] [li]What should I do for 99 Prayer?[/li][/ul]
[b][font=comic sans ms][size=12pt]Ranged[/size][/font][/b]
[ul][li]How long does 99 Ranged take from 70 Ranged?[/li] [li]What should i do for the fastest way to train from 70 Ranged to 99?[/li] [li]How much does 99 Ranged take from 70?[/li][/ul]

item.title: Fastest way to two 99's?
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

[quote=“Rich, post:14, topic:408895”]Complete Nomad’s Requiem.

http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Nomad’s_Requiem[/quote]
Looks extremly hard.

Read full topic

item.title: Fastest way to two 99's?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Complete Nomad’s Requiem.

RuneScape Wiki

Nomad's Requiem

Nomad's Requiem is a grandmaster quest featuring an investigation into the activities of Nomad, the creator of Soul Wars. At the time of its release, the final boss fight was considered to be the hardest of any quest in the game. The dark underbelly...

Read full topic

item.title: Fastest way to two 99's?
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

SacredHeart:

Thankyou eveyone, as for Ranged I still need help.

P.S. Do not buy red chins, and train in the Ape Atoll dungeon, bring a greegee, enchanted excaliber, 4 ranging pots, rest prayer pots (I suggest bringing a holy wrench as well). Use void, Zamorak book, Soul Wars cape, snakeskin boots, ranging amulet (or glory), and ring of life (or duel ring for teleport if you don't use glory).

Read full topic

item.title: Fastest way to two 99's?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“Rich, post:6, topic:408453”]Chinning is easy as fuck, just do gray chins to 99. You don’t even need to move when chinning, you can just split-screen and do other things while only looking at RS every minute or so to drink prayer pots/ranging pots.

I got 90-99 ranging in 3 days doing this and it only cost 10-15mil, cheap and fast as fuck.[/quote]
P.S. Do not buy red chins, and train in the Ape Atoll dungeon, bring a greegee, enchanted excaliber, 4 ranging pots, rest prayer pots (I suggest bringing a holy wrench as well). Use void, Zamorak book, Soul Wars cape, snakeskin boots, ranging amulet (or glory), and ring of life (or duel ring for teleport if you don’t use glory).

Read full topic

item.title: Fastest way to two 99's?
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

For range, kill mummies in the chaos tunnels with red chins. Prayer is self explanatory just know that you are going to have to fork out alot of cash

Read full topic

item.title: Fastest way to two 99's?
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:5, topic:408895”]I got prayer in a day. Used Frost and Runners. I got it from like 85 and it was was something like 300M or so.

Familiars are essential . The extra spaces help so much. But I found having a constant supply of people running bones to me more efficient, but you have to pay them.

As for range, fuck it. Not my skill.[/quote]

hillgiants with a maple short bow & iron arrows ++

Read full topic

item.title: Fastest way to two 99's?
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

I got prayer in a day. Used Frost and Runners. I got it from like 85 and it was was something like 300M or so.

Familiars are essential . The extra spaces help so much. But I found having a constant supply of people running bones to me more efficient, but you have to pay them.

As for range, fuck it. Not my skill.

item.title: Fastest way to two 99's?
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

[quote=“Kozs, post:2, topic:408895”]Prayer
•How long does 99 Prayer take? A week if u no life
•How much does 99 Prayer cost from 60?prob like 160-200m
•What should I do for 99 Prayer?Dragon Bones on Lit G Atlar
Ranged
•How long does 99 Ranged take from 70 Ranged? 1-2 Weeks
•What should i do for the fastest way to train from 70 Ranged to 99? Chinchompa
•How much does 99 Ranged take from 70? Could be free if u get drops.[/quote]
What chins, Red or grey? Also, How much to buy the chins?

Read full topic
